location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Amir Chah showing W end of valley. Closed by sand drifts. Also Amir Chah thana’

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:Black and white photograph showing a plain with tents, what appears to be a fort, and several people in the foreground, and hills in the background.Inscriptions:Upper right, above image, in pen: ‘No 3.’Centre, below image, in pen: ‘Amir Chah showing W end of valley. Closed by sand drifts. Also[?] Amir Chah thana’.
